cu.error_type: unreachable elements or wrong routing definitions
cu.explanation_en: Changing the remote S port for control to 502 instead of 500 prevents the CU from connecting to the DU's F1-C interface, leading to F1 setup failure.

du.error_type: unreachable elements or wrong routing definitions
du.explanation_en: Setting the remote N port for control to 502 causes the DU to attempt connection on a mismatched port, disrupting F1-Northbound interface communication.
